detectors.description: CertificationRegistry.toCertificateKey(string,string) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x84397b2da219d83ebf575b8a61d05a8d8d3baafd-CertificationRegistry.sol#463-469) calls keccak256(abi.encodePacked()) with multiple dynamic arguments.
